name: STORYMAKER
description:
STORY MAKER         

13 oct 2022 ver 0.4.3

Hello! My name is Chris Daven S. Callano. and this is Story Maker.

Today, you are going to make a story with the help of Dan Harmon's Story Circle.

The inputs you will give will make up your story from start to finish.

this is a small project i am making where you can make your own stories.
